title: Did not get my lvl 40 Emote Shard
body:
I think it's some kind of bug, because i got ,at the same time i level'd,  a chest.
I received the capsule, but not the emote shard. 
I was wondering what can be done to fix this. 

Thanks for any help

replies.body: Heya, I double checked your capsule and everything was looted so rest easy!  The emote you received is not a shard, it will be fully available in your Emotes collection.  :D
Yup, i'm an idiot... Thanks for the help <3

The emote is inside the capsule when you open it, and I believe it gets automatically unlocked when you open it. If you check your emotes collection, you should see this emote.
https://i.imgur.com/INJhuhG.png
